item.title: PDF vs ZIP Compression - Which is Better?
item.dc:creator: AltafToolsHub Team
item.description: Wondering whether to compress your PDF internally or ZIP it? We compare both methods and explain when to use each approach for optimal results.
item.content:encoded:
Both PDF compression and ZIP compression have their place. Let's explore when to use each method.

PDF Compression Advantages

  • Maintains PDF functionality
  • No extraction needed
  • Better for single document sharing
  • Preserves searchability

ZIP Compression Advantages

  • Works for multiple files
  • Universal format
  • Can include non-PDF files

Our Recommendation

For single PDFs, use PDF compression. For multiple files or mixed formats, use ZIP.
